projects.title: Monika
projects.description: Monika is a command line application to monitor every part of your web app using a simple JSON configuration file. Get alert not only when your site is down but also when it's slow.

projects.title: Grule Rule Engine
projects.description: Grule is a Rule Engine library for Golang programming language. Inspired by the acclaimed JBOSS Drools, done in a much simple manner.

projects.title: HttpTarget
projects.description: HttpTarget is a very simple, small and lightweight HTTP server that would be helpful for http client development tool. Simply start the server and it'll be ready to accept incoming http requests. It can easily simulate heavy server side load by implementing random delay range, or simulate any kind of http response code.

projects.title: Firebase Cronjob
projects.description: Using the Scheduled functions feature, the function autoIncrementJobCounter gets executed once every minute. This function does a very simple thing, i.e. it increments the value of jobConfig/counter in the Firestore database.

projects.title: Universal Update Checker
projects.description: React component to check if there is a new version of your mobile app.

projects.title: WhatsApp Chatbot Connector
projects.description: WhatsApp Chatbot Connector backend built using Express.js. It is designed to integrate with the WhatsApp Business API and supports various AI platforms such as Dify and Rasa.
